DEXP¶

Welcome to dexp (* Light-sheet Dataset Exploration and Processing*) documentation.

How to use dexp ?¶

First you need a dataset acquired on a light-sheet microscope, see here for supported microscopes and formats.

Second, you can use any of the commands here to process your data. The list of commands can be found by :

dexp --help
